subject: Baseball
Sports Medicine
Thyroid Gland
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran (knee) and Jose Reyes (overactive thyroid) are expected to miss the first month of the season, but Beltran is still offering words of encouragement.
snippet: Carlos Beltran (knee) and Jose Reyes (overactive thyroid) are expected to miss the first month of the season, but Beltran is still offering words of encouragement.
